x_nuvo_diag_probes.description:
Go to module Find People Place or thing and nothing will come up.
Issue Reproduction steps :
-Login or Impersonate user -Go to Find People Places thing -Nothing will come up expect spinner
x_nuvo_diag_probes.name: Find People Place or Thing not working
x_nuvo_diag_probes.remediation: The issue is due to the missing Home Base reference on the user's profile.
x_nuvo_diag_probes.sys_name: Find People Place or Thing not working

sys_update_version.name: x_nuvo_diag_probes_27d563bddb8ddd105f598b05059619d8
sys_update_version.payload:
<?xml version="1.0" encoding="UTF-8"?><record_update table="x_nuvo_diag_probes"><x_nuvo_diag_probes action="INSERT_OR_UPDATE"><active>true</active><description>Go to module Find People Place or thing and nothing will come up.

Issue Reproduction steps :

-Login or Impersonate user 
-Go to Find People Places thing
-Nothing will come up expect spinner</description><healthcheck_type/><name>Find People Place or Thing not working </name><order>100</order><probe_type/><product_version/><remediation>The issue is due to the missing Home Base reference on the user's profile.</remediation><script><![CDATA[var util = new x_nuvo_diag.DiagnosticUtil();
	
var userId = gs.getUserID();
var checkHomeBase = new GlideRecord('sys_user');
checkHomeBase.addEncodedQuery('x_nuvo_eam_primary_locationISNOTEMPTY^sys_id=' + userId);
checkHomeBase.query();

if(checkHomeBase.getRowCount() < 1){
	
	util.handleOutput('If open Find People Place or thing and no maps load on default, than the issue is due to the missing Home Base reference on the your user profile', 'Warning', 'Space');
}
]]></script><sys_class_name>x_nuvo_diag_probes</sys_class_name><sys_created_by>Harshal.Sonawane@nuvolo.com</sys_created_by><sys_created_on>2022-08-02 12:14:37</sys_created_on><sys_id>27d563bddb8ddd105f598b05059619d8</sys_id><sys_mod_count>17</sys_mod_count><sys_name>Find People Place or Thing not working </sys_name><sys_package display_value="Diagnostic Tool" source="x_nuvo_diag">3acdaefd1be7fc107798a9b7624bcb74</sys_package><sys_policy/><sys_scope display_value="Diagnostic Tool">3acdaefd1be7fc107798a9b7624bcb74</sys_scope><sys_update_name>x_nuvo_diag_probes_27d563bddb8ddd105f598b05059619d8</sys_update_name><sys_updated_by>Stefan.Popov@nuvolo.com</sys_updated_by><sys_updated_on>2024-09-17 11:21:27</sys_updated_on><tool>diagnostic</tool></x_nuvo_diag_probes></record_update>
sys_update_version.record_name: Find People Place or Thing not working

sys_audit_delete.display_value: Find People Place or Thing not working

sys_metadata_delete.sys_name: Find People Place or Thing not working
